summary: The diff implements War Mode Entry UI with configuration and confirmation modals. All 7 requirements (REQ-55 through REQ-61) appear to be implemented: the ENTER WAR MODE button is added to OverviewDashboard with proper styling and touch targets, a WarModeConfigModal component includes duration selectors with presets (60/90/120 minutes), break toggle with conditional break duration selector (5/10/15 minutes), validation logic, confirmation flow, and mobile-responsive design. No hallucinated features detected beyond the specified requirements.
